title: glottolog/glottolog: Glottolog database 4.6 as CLDF
citation: Hammarström, Harald & Forkel, Robert & Haspelmath, Martin & Bank, Sebastian. 2022. Glottolog 4.6. Leipzig: Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology. (Available online at https://glottolog.org)
description: Comprehensive reference information for the world's languages, especially the lesser known languages
